column3: A candidate's campaign is not likely to be successful unless he or she receives lots of donations.

column2: Once ~, 주어 + 동사
column3: Once a machine is purchased and installed, it can be operated with only minimal maintenance costs.

column2: Suppose 주어 + 과거 동사

column2: Let's assume that 주어 + 동사
column3: Let's assume that not all workers with part-time jobs work more than 20 hours a week.

column3: Assuming that people use social media responsibly, it can be a powerful tool for education and awareness.

column2: Given ~, 주어 + 동사
column3: Given the extremely high rate of unemployment, something must be done to create more jobs.

column2: Presumably, 주어 + 동사
column3: Presumably, children get many advantages from taking mandatory physical education classes in elementary school.

column2: Regardless of ~, 주어 + 동사
column3: Regardless of the amount of natural talent one has, if one does not work hard, one will not achieve success.

column2: For instance/example, 주어 + 동사
column3: For instance, movies often include harmful stereotypes of people from different countries.

column2: To be specific, 주어 + 동사

column3: Take the example of Bill Gates, who donated a substantial amount of his wealth to benefit society.

column3: From my experience, students tend to remember more if they go over the notes later.

column3: Moreover, an increasing number of people perceive the prices of movie tickets as expensive because streaming services are so affordable.

column2: In short, 주어 + 동사
column3: In short, I believe that parents should be selective about how much time their children can spend watching TV.

column2: As I have mentioned, 주어 + 동사

column2: In conclusion, 주어 + 동사

column2: Overall, 주어 + 동사

column2: To sum up, 주어 + 동사

column2: In this regard, 주어 + 동사

column2: All things considered, 주어 + 동사

column2: For the most part, 주어 + 동사

column2: On the whole, 주어 + 동사

column3: Last but not least, war never decides who is right, but who is left.

column2: In this way, 주어 + 동사

column2: That is, 주어 + 동사
